bill.title: Community redevelopment.
bill.description: An act to amend Section 53760.1 of the Government Code, and to amend Sections 33500, 33501, 34163, 34171, 34173, 34175, 34176, 34177, 34178, 34179, 34180, 34181, 34182, 34183, 34185, 34186, 34187, 34188, and 34189 of, to add Sections 34167.10, 34177.3, 34177.5, 34178.8, 34179.5, 34179.6, 34179.7, 34179.8, 34182.5, 34183.5, 34189.1, 34189.2, and 34189.3 to, to add Chapter 9 (commencing with Section 34191.1) to Part 1.85 of Division 24 of, and to add and repeal Section 34176.5 of, the Health and Safety Code, relating to community redevelopment, and making an appropriation therefor, to take effect immediately, bill related to the budget.

history.action: Introduced. Read first time. To Com. on RLS. for assignment. To print.
From printer. May be acted upon on or after March 8.
Withdrawn from committee. (Ayes 24. Noes 14. Page 2916.) Ordered to second reading.
Read second time. Ordered to third reading.
Read third time. Passed. (Ayes 23. Noes 10. Page 2980.) Ordered to the Assembly.
In Assembly. Read first time. Held at Desk.
From committee with author's amendments. Read second time and amended. Re-referred to Com. on BUDGET.
Assembly Rule 96 suspended. (Ayes 50. Noes 26. Page 5460.) Withdrawn from committee. Ordered to third reading.

votes.desc: Senate 3rd Reading SB1024 Committee on B. & F.R. (Leno)
